channel.title: Are YOU a PC gamer or are you a Xbox360 and Ps3 gamer or wii?
channel.description: MY PC stats AMD Phenom II X6 1090T Black Edition 3.8Ghz 12Gigs of DDR3 RAM 2 Nvida 9800GTX2 Sli "each card has 2gigs of Vram" 2 1T hard drives Windows 7 "64bit" And ubuntu "64bit"

item.title: Are YOU a PC gamer or are you a Xbox360 and Ps3 gamer or wii?
item.dc:creator: @ajs47951 ajs47951
item.description:
@ajs47951 wrote:

why are you geting all that its a real real real waste of $$$$$ and just because it has 32 cores it will not be any faster then a 4 core CPU because most games out will not use 4 core just 2 to play there games and all most all programs out only use 2 cores and wont use 3 or 4
And if you don’t buy a really fast hard dive stuff wont be any fast your wasting a lot of $$$$$$$$

Read full topic

item.title: Are YOU a PC gamer or are you a Xbox360 and Ps3 gamer or wii?
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

[quote=“jmood128, post:38, topic:349551”][quote author=ajs47951 link=topic=445924.msg3276685#msg3276685 date=1279574538]

Xbox. I play my Wii once in awhile as well, but I don’t constantly play it. My computer can’t handle good downloadable games and I don’t own a PS3.

Exact same for m

is you graphics card not good or graphics chip because you can over clock them. You can do the Same with your CPU!
“Just make sure you know what your doing “or know someone who knows what there doing” before you over clock some thing because you can burn up you Hardware and thats never good” lol :eek: and your life of you hardware gets cut 50% or 25% but its a easy why to stay on the “Bleeding edge” of game with out paying to much $$$$$$$$$$$$$$$ ;D
[/quote]

If I buy the 32 core server, I will have no reason to over clock since it runs at a 3.8 GHz CPU.[/quote]Ok got my RAM and a dual-core graphics card ~ 40£ till i can get teh 32 core thingy l0l

Read full topic
item.source: Are YOU a PC gamer or are you a Xbox360 and Ps3 gamer or wii?

item.title: Are YOU a PC gamer or are you a Xbox360 and Ps3 gamer or wii?
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

[quote=“ajs47951, post:37, topic:349551”][quote author=Atk2-99 link=topic=445924.msg3275552#msg3275552 date=1279507492]

Xbox. I play my Wii once in awhile as well, but I don’t constantly play it. My computer can’t handle good downloadable games and I don’t own a PS3.

Exact same for m
[/quote]
is you graphics card not good or graphics chip because you can over clock them. You can do the Same with your CPU!
“Just make sure you know what your doing “or know someone who knows what there doing” before you over clock some thing because you can burn up you Hardware and thats never good” lol :eek: and your life of you hardware gets cut 50% or 25% but its a easy why to stay on the “Bleeding edge” of game with out paying to much $$$$$$$$$$$$$$$ ;D[/quote]

If I buy the 32 core server, I will have no reason to over clock since it runs at a 3.8 GHz CPU.

Read full topic

item.title: Are YOU a PC gamer or are you a Xbox360 and Ps3 gamer or wii?
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

[quote=“justinxg27, post:30, topic:349551”][quote author=pure2ownage link=topic=445924.msg3273640#msg3273640 date=1279403546]

[quote author=jmood128 link=topic=445924.msg3273043#msg3273043 date=1279358785]

Processor: AMD Athlon™ 64 X2 Dual Core Processor 3800+, MMX, 3DNow (2 CPUs), ~2.0GHz
Memory: 3198MB RAM
Hard Drive: 240 GB - I might buy a 1tb or save up for Intels 32 core server. :S
Video Card: NVIDIA GeForce 6100
Operating System: Windows XP Professional (5.1, Build 2600) Service Pack 3 (2600.xpsp_sp3_gdr.091208-2036)
This computer was playing games like WoW with 1gb of RAM. to bad its like almost 6 years old to…

Kind of computer, PS3, Wii, game cube, gameboy…

How can you play anything on a 6100 and is you pc a Gateway or is a make “my friend has a old one like that”

“thats really old” I remember my pc in 2000 i got a 6200 at that time it was the best and it cost almost $600 now you can by one for $32 on newegg
that pc that i had in 2000 was a Pentium 4 3.8ghz with 2gigs of ram and a 80gig hard drive and a nvida 6200 (dame pc have come a long way)

Its a gateway, also I doubt you bought the extreme edition of the Pentium 4 processor.

I say that because that processor speed didn’t come out in 2000. http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pentium_4

I also have to say your graphics card didn’t even come out in 2000 it come out in 2004 when my computer was made.

en.wikipedia.org

GeForce

GeForce is a brand of graphics processing units (GPUs) designed by Nvidia. As of the GeForce 10 series, there have been fourteen iterations of the design. The first GeForce products were discrete GPUs designed for add-on graphics boards, intended for the high-margin PC gaming market, and later diversification of the product line covered all tiers of the PC graphics market, ranging from cost-sensitive GPUs integrated on motherboards, to mainstream add-in retail boards. Most recently, GeForce te Wi...

On the other hand my computer is very decent for its age due to it has most of the stuff that was advance during 2004.
[/quote]After I buy 32GB Ram + 4 x 1TB HDD on monday
[/quote]I don’t understand why you need so much ram… 4gig can pretty much run anything.[/quote]I just like the specs lookin’ good lawl

[quote=“Kihomura, post:29, topic:349551”]If my brother goes to jail next week, I get his PS3 and all his games.[/quote]lawl then add me.

Read full topic
